about_the_game:
Vecter is a fast-paced runner and shooter game where your objective is to survive by dodging obstacles and enemies, and causing chaos in your path. Get in your ship, crank up the throttle, and try to survive for as long as possible by destroying anything that stands in your way.

Expect obstacles, foes, power-ups, and plenty of surprises along the way. You'll need to be quick-eyed because there won't be any time to blink!

Challenge your friends and strangers for the top spot on the daily leaderboard. If you come out on top, you'll hold that position for that day and track forever.

If you're truly exceptional, aim for global recognition on the Steam community leaderboards, where you'll compete with players from all around the world. Here's the link in case you need it



I am a solo developer, and I'm creating this game purely out of my passion, despite my other real-life commitments. As a result, development may sometimes be slow. It's a hobby and an enjoyable one, but at this stage, it remains just a hobby.
detailed_description:
Keep Vecter Free

Vecter is and will always be a 100% FREE game. It's my hobby, my passion, and my gift to the world for everyone to enjoy, regardless of age, gender, location, race, wealth, or social status.

If you truly enjoy Vecter and share these values, consider sharing it with others. As Vecter relies solely on word-of-mouth for growth and has no revenue streams, spreading the word is crucial for its reach. If you wish to support its development financially, you can do so by purchasing the Donation DLC. All proceeds go towards buying me coffee and pizza to continue adding features and content to the game.


About the Game

Vecter is a fast-paced runner and shooter game where your objective is to survive by dodging obstacles and enemies, and causing chaos in your path. Get in your ship, crank up the throttle, and try to survive for as long as possible by destroying anything that stands in your way.

Expect obstacles, foes, power-ups, and plenty of surprises along the way. You'll need to be quick-eyed because there won't be any time to blink!

Challenge your friends and strangers for the top spot on the daily leaderboard. If you come out on top, you'll hold that position for that day and track forever.

If you're truly exceptional, aim for global recognition on the Steam community leaderboards, where you'll compete with players from all around the world. Here's the link in case you need it



I am a solo developer, and I'm creating this game purely out of my passion, despite my other real-life commitments. As a result, development may sometimes be slow. It's a hobby and an enjoyable one, but at this stage, it remains just a hobby.
legal_notice: You are free to use any parts of Vecter to create new, original audio, video, or text-based material for another video game or multimedia project, with the requirement that the game be credited by linking back to the Vecter Steam page. Any other use is permitted only after obtaining consent from the developer (Taranasus). You may request consent by contacting the developer at taranasus@gmail.com.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Manjaro or Ubuntu but it may work on others
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 2400 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 730 or AMD R7 240, Integrated GPUs are not supported
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes!
  • Additional Notes: If it can run Crysis it can run this (Yes I'm reviving this expired joke)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Manjaro or Ubuntu but it may work on others
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 will do nicely
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Still yes!
  • Additional Notes: If you can run DOTA you can run this

short_description: Vecter is a fast-paced runner and shooter game where your goal is to survive by the skin of your teeth and raise hell in your path. You get in your ship, you push the throttle on max and then try to survive for as long as possible by annihilating anything that gets in your way.
